submitRequirements_zh: 需要提供详细的bug报告或功能请求，遵循贡献指南
submitRequirements_en: Detailed bug reports or feature requests required, following contribution guidelines
rating_zh: 革命性的CSS框架，通过实用优先的方法大大提高了开发效率。学习曲线平缓，可定制性强，是现代前端开发的必备工具。
rating_en: Revolutionary CSS framework that greatly improves development efficiency through a utility-first approach. Gentle learning curve, highly customizable, an essential tool for modern frontend development.
